title: An unexpected error has occurred while logging in
body:
Can't log in. Tried on 4 of my accounts all don't work. Re-installed the game as well.
The repair tool also didn't help.

replies.body: Most of the time you'll only see that error when the League client can't get a solid connection to our servers, but it's not sure what the main problem is. Check up on some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if anything might need to be updated, and let me know if that doesn't help!
Hi I am having the same issue. I played two games last night and now I cannot login. I have tried everything on the list and nothing worked.
go into your router and enable MAC address cloning.  Change a couple letters and numbers (like - swap the last 2 pairs with each other).  Worked for me.
